whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Templates
whatsapp.description: Customize confirmation messages sent to requesters via WhatsApp
whatsapp.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Allowed: JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF
whatsapp.sendTestDesc: Enter a phone number to receive a test message with sample data.
whatsapp.clickToUpload: Click to upload image or PDF
whatsapp.info1: Messages are sent automatically when someone submits a form via kiosk
whatsapp.info2: For Child Dedication and Holy Matrimony, messages are sent to all participants
whatsapp.info3: Use placeholders like {{name}} to personalize messages
whatsapp.info4: Attachments (image or PDF) are sent along with the message
